    • Uses of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation

      Subinterfaces of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  NetworkOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a data transmission operation between two Jobs through a given route in the network.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkOperationDefault
      This implementation will automatically find a new Route using the RoutingProtocol on the host of the parent job's VM each time it is activated.
      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation with parameters of type Operation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Uses of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation

      Subinterfaces of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  StorageOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a storage operation on a given StorageFile.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StorageOperationDefault
      This implementations uses, when its StorageFile is located in a remote host, a OperationSynchronizer in order to synchronize this storage operation with the network operation.

    • Uses of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation

      Subinterfaces of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  RemoteOperation<Resource>
      This interface describes an Operation that has also a destination Job.
      interface  SynchronizableOperation<Resource>
      An operation that offers methods to easily synchronize it with other operations.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      This class defines a Operation that uses a LongResource.
      class  OperationImpl<Resource> 
      class  TimerOperation
      A operation that runs for a given delay, then becomes completed.
      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation that return Operation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Operation<Resource> Operation.clone() 
      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation with parameters of type Operation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean SynchronizableOperation.isSynchronized(Operation<?> operation)
      Return true if current operation is synchronized with the given operation.
      void SynchronizableOperation.startSynchronization(long delay, Operation<?> operation)
      Call this method so that the current operation will adjust its allocated resource in order to finish (ie: to be completed) after running for at least the given delay.
      static OperationSynchronizer OperationSynchronizer.synchronizeOperations(Operation<?> operation1, Operation<?> operation2)
      Same as OperationSynchronizer.synchronizeOperations(Operation, Operation, RunnableStateChanged) with null OperationSynchronizer.RunnableStateChanged.
      static OperationSynchronizer OperationSynchronizer.synchronizeOperations(Operation<?> operation1, Operation<?> operation2)
      Same as OperationSynchronizer.synchronizeOperations(Operation, Operation, RunnableStateChanged) with null OperationSynchronizer.RunnableStateChanged.
      static OperationSynchronizer OperationSynchronizer.synchronizeOperations(Operation<?> operation1, Operation<?> operation2, OperationSynchronizer.RunnableStateChanged r)
      Creates and returns an operation synchronizer for the two operations.
      static OperationSynchronizer OperationSynchronizer.synchronizeOperations(Operation<?> operation1, Operation<?> operation2, OperationSynchronizer.RunnableStateChanged r)
      Creates and returns an operation synchronizer for the two operations.

    • Uses of Operation in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner

      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner with type parameters of type Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FairProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner ensures fair distribution of the available capacity through active operations.
      static class  FairProvisioner.OperationComparator<OperationType extends Operation<? extends LongResource>> 
      class  FastFairProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner gives promises that are equal to the average capacity computed by considering all active operations that use this provisioner.
      class  InfiniteProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner always give resource promises with a value of Long.MAX_VALUE.
      class  LongProvisionerImpl<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource> 
      interface  Provisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource> 
      class  StaticProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner gives promises that are equal to its current free capacity.
